title: Shopping Bag, "Bloomingdale's: Give Hope.", 1992
creditline: Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg
description:
Recto: "GI/ VE" covers entire bag.  Left side is red, right is lime green.  Verso: "HOPE" in center in black inside oval.  Left side is lime green, right side is red. In left side panel: 1992.
In both side panels: Lists of charities suggesting ways to give in 1992.

tombstone.epitaph: Shopping Bag, "Bloomingdale's: Give Hope.", 1992. Paper; black plastic handles.. Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg. 1999-34-1.
